tr.td: <description>Native interface to SQLite for PhoneGap/Cordova. Allows you to use more storage and provides more flexibility than the standard Web SQL database (window.openDatabase).</description>

td.span: <!-- wp8 using dlls [should work but not tested on wp7]
NOTE: SQLiteWPNative.dll includes the classes from SQLite.cs
